message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for $150. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you is $120. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not comfortable selling it to you for $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $125. Let me know if that's something you'd be willing to consider!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?

Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering $122. That's as low as I'm willing to go. Let me know if that's something you'd be willing to accept!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above $122. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $118?

Hi Bob, I'm not getting any younger, and I really want to get this deal done. I'm willing to make one last concession, so I'm counteroffering $120. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're willing to meet me at this price!
